title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2E.42 - NEXT XX EXITS Sign
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2E.42 - NEXT XX EXITS Sign

State Regulations
INSERT the following at paragraph: Option: 03A The NEXT XX EXITS sign may also identify the exits
associated with a region or area by specifying exit numbers in the sign legend
(e.g., EXITS 5-9) in the order they will be encountered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2E.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
